resources.string:
Mobile and web developer, mostly work in React Native for past two years, sometimes work as web developer using React and C# The important thing to remember is that since ScrollView can only have one child, you have to wrap that ImageView and the TextView into a LinearLayout.
There is no solution code provided for this challenge, but the skeleton code below gives you the expected view hierarchy to use.
SKELETON code of view hierarchy: The important thing to remember is that since ScrollView can only have one child, you have to wrap that ImageView and the TextView into a LinearLayout.
